lines.gurmukhi: bys√çw ky isMgwr ibibcwr ko n pwru pweIAY ibnu Brqwr kw kI nwr kY bulweIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Baysvaa Kay Singaar Bibichaar Ko N Paaru Paaeeai , Binu Bharataar Kaa Kee Naar Kai Bulaaeeai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: The embellishments of a whore and her relationships with many men cannot be fathomed. Without a husband, whose wife can she be known as?

lines.gurmukhi: bgu syqI jIv Gwq kir Kwq kyqy ko moin gih iDAwn Dry jugq n pweIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Bagu Saytee Jeev Ghaat Kari Khaat Kaytay Ko , Moni Gahi Dhiaan Dharay Jougat N Paaeeai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: A heron is white like a swan but it kills many living beings to appease his appetite. To do this evil act, he stands in perfect silence, but in doing so, he does not achieve the know-how of yog.

lines.gurmukhi: BwNf kI BMfweI burvweI n khq AwvY Aiq hI iFTweI sukcq n ljweIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Bhaand Kee Bhandaaee Buravaaee N Kahat Aavai , Ati Hee Ddhitthaaee Soukachat N Lajaaeeai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: One cannot explain the shamelessness of the actions and words used by a mimic. He does not shy away from using bad words out of sheer obstinacy.

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy pr qn Dn dUKn qiRdoK mm ADm Anyk eyk rom n pujweIAY ]522]
lines.transliteration_english: Taisay Par Tan Dhan Dookhan Tridokh Mama , Adham Anayk Ayk Rom N Pujaaeeai ?522?

Shabad OS B.translation: Similarly, like these low character people, I am low too. I am a chronic patient of the three diseases, that is looking at others wealth, woman and slandering others. Numerous sinners cannot match even a hair of my sinful life. I am lowest of all the low
